Miramar aggravated burglary: Police appeal over silver Mazda, clothing items https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/miramar-aggravated-burglary-police-police-appeal-oppeal-oppeal-ober-silver-silver-mazda-clothing-items/33mgozpgjzpgjzhqriqm76fs65nrom/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/miramar-aggravated-burglary-police-police-appeal-oppeal-oppeal-ober-silver-silver-mazda-clothing-items/33mgozpgjzpgjzhqriqm76fs65nrom/ Police are interested in information about a white cap and women's gumboots from scene. Mon, 31 Mar 2025 06:18:33 +0000 Police want to hear from the driver of a Grey or Silver Mazda Atenza/Mazda 6 that was seen driving through Darlington Rd and Camperdown Rd intersection early on March 17.

Faulty filters delay Gisborne wastewater treatment plant upgradehttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/faulty-falty-filters-delay-delay-gisborne-wastewater-wastewater-treatment-wartment-plant-plant-upgrade/nh3bzliz6bzbtni4xu4xu4xu4xu4p2s6eudge/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/faulty-falty-filters-delay-delay-gisborne-wastewater-wastewater-treatment-wartment-plant-plant-upgrade/nh3bzliz6bzbtni4xu4xu4xu4xu4p2s6eudge/ Zita Campbell The faulty filters caused a one-year delay in Gisborne's plant upgrade. Mon, 31 Mar 2025 05:00:00 +0000 Gisborne District Council is a year behind schedule for stage two of its waste water treatment plant upgrade due to "underlying design flaws” of two tertiary filters.
